name: Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 Blob
description: Storage Gen2 Blob connector to load a CSV or Parquet blob/file in Omniscope.
introductoryText:
![Azure Data Lake](data:image/png;base64,)

### Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 Blob Connector
#### Opens and loads a CSV or Parquet blob / file from an Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 blob container.
##### Instructions:
1. Copy your credentials from the Azure portal
1.1 Sign in to the Azure portal.
1.2 Locate your storage account.
1.3 In the Settings section of the storage account overview, select Access keys. 
1.4 Find the Connection string value under key1, and select the Copy button to copy the connection string and paste in this block config.

2. Insert the Blob Container name

3. Insert the Blob/File path *(e.g. myfolder/myfile.parquet)* to download from the Data Lake and load its data in this block.

options.name: connectionString
options.title: Connection String
options.description: In the Settings section of the storage account overview, select Access keys, find the Connection string value under key1, and select the Copy button to copy the connection string

options.name: containerName
options.title: Container Name
options.description: The name of the blob container

options.name: blobPath
options.title: Blob File Name / Path
options.description: The blob / file name or path to download, e.g. myfolder/myfile.csv
